data.text:
@ICMRDELHI @MoHFW_INDIA @DeptHealthRes @PIB_India @mygovindia @COVIDNewsByMIB Dear sir 
            I am sougata Roy from India I will go to France next month but France government are not accepting covaxin for Indian travellers please take necessary action and request to French government that they are accepting covaxin for Indian travellers

@ICMRDELHI @MoHFW_INDIA @DeptHealthRes @PIB_India @mygovindia @COVIDNewsByMIB China hide the truth and spread the virus since 2019
Millions of people in the world are killed

@HPatel22849078 @ICMRDELHI @MoHFW_INDIA @DeptHealthRes @PIB_India @mygovindia @COVIDNewsByMIB Why so? High risk contact tracing in guideline too contact tracing should be must moreover current guidelines are messed up @ICMRDELHI is a fraud agency working like puppet to @MoHFW_INDIA so that election could be conducted made shit guidelines

@ICMRDELHI @MoHFW_INDIA @DeptHealthRes @PIB_India @mygovindia @COVIDNewsByMIB Were all 873395 people symptomatic,what is their CT scores ??, (since as per guidelines only symptomatic need be tested) . How many tested positive?
@ICMRDELHI @MoHFW_INDIA @DeptHealthRes @PIB_India @mygovindia @COVIDNewsByMIB 3993 केस आए कभी होगा 0 ओर एक्टिव केस 0

@ICMRDELHI @MoHFW_INDIA @DeptHealthRes @PIB_India @mygovindia @COVIDNewsByMIB रोजाना पांच करोड़ टेस्ट कर पूरे महीने में पूरे भारत की टेस्टिंग कर इस बेहद खतरनाक महामारी से सबको बचाना चाहिए लाइन लगाकर सबकी करो टेस्टिंग चाहे बीमारी मिले या नही चुनाव हो गए हैं अभी आ सकता है नया करोना और लहर
